comment: Hi ! We are working on your concern . Please allow us some more time to come back to you with a resolution . Appreciate your patience - Aisha
amr:

      :snt1 (h / hi
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (w / work-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)
            :ARG1 (c / concern-01
                  :ARG1 (y / you)))
      :snt3 (a / allow-01

            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (t / time
                  :quant (s / some)
                  :mod (m2 / more))

                        :ARG0 w3)))
      :snt4 (a2 / appreciate-02

            :ARG1 (p / patient-01
                  :ARG1 y4))
      :snt5 (s2 / say-01

            :ARG1 y4))
